name: Flowers of Evil
description:
Romance is coming your way, and it smells like dirt! :-)

Demo release to meet yanjam deadline, with a full game release expected within the next week or two.

Currently includes:

-2 out of 4 total planned endings

-10k words (with more to come!)

-A lot of poetry quotations- if you like the romantics, this one is for you!

Content Warnings Include stalking/obsession, yandere themes, kidnapping/imprisonment, minor violence, body horror, and flashing lights.

Poems in this work include;

-“The Set of The Romantic Sun,” by Charles Baudelaire, translated by Cyril Scott

-“The Wild Honeysuckle” by Philip Frenau

-“Love and Thought” by Ralph Waldo Emmerson

-“Tree Heart True Heart” by Kay Ryan

-“I Wandered Lonely As A Cloud” by William Wordsworth

-“Wild nights- wild nights!” by Emily Dickinson

-“The Love A Life Can Show Below” by Emily Dickinson

-“Love Song” by William Butler Yeats

-“Let It Go” by ee cummings

-“A Primer For Small Weird Loves” by Richard Siken

Music and sound fx sourced from pixabay, with the exception of the UI FX below.

UI, Mechanical, Text-Scroll, 03, FX, 01, LOOP.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

UI, Text Scroll, FX, F2 2 200, by EVRetro of Freesound.org

Monster Scream FX, LittleRobotSoundFactory of Freesound.org

Background stock images sourced through unsplash and edited by myself. 

Everything else was little old me :-)

tumblr for the project is located here
